rows.label: qev015601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, this open-air shop is delightful!
It is truly the purveyor's paradise I have been seeking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Salutations. Are you the proprietor of this charming
boutique? We would make words at you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0003
rows.name:
...What? Look, buddy, if this is about the shop,
can we do it later?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0004
rows.name:
I haven't got a thing to sell. The shelves are empty.
...Just like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_JNK0010
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev015601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Regina what happened to her inventory.

rows.label: qev015601_JNK0020
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev015601_SEL0021
rows.name: Offer to help Regina if she needs it.

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0005
rows.name:
My husband's a Pathfinder. ...Was a Pathfinder.
He'd come back here with all sorts of weird junk,
and I'd sell it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0006
rows.name:
But some xeno killed him, so yeah. No more junk.
...And no more husband.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0007
rows.name: I'm done. Done with all of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0008
rows.name: That's sweet. You're a BLADE, I take it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0009
rows.name:
So was my husband. He was out on an assignment a
while back when some xeno... Well, it killed him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0010
rows.name:
He used to find me little trinkets to sell, but since then...
Yeah. I have nothing to sell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0011
rows.name: And I have no idea what I'm going to do now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0012
rows.name:
If I can't keep the shop going, I need to find some
other job. Some way to support the BLADEs.
At least, that's what I should do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0013
rows.name:
But I just don't have the energy, you know?
It's all I can do to just stand here and talk to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Our condolences for your loss, my good woman,
but this may just be the chance of a lifeline![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0015
rows.name:
You see, we have been collecting and producing works
of the most exquisite sort for some time now.
Inventions and such, mostly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0016
rows.name:
And it is our fevered wish to sell them to the people of
Earth at bargain cellar prices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0017
rows.name:
This store is a fitting vessel for the display and sale
of said works, is it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0018
rows.name:
As such, we most hungrily request that you permit us
the use of your delightful shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0019
rows.name:
Is this blue thing for real? My husband is dead!
We ran this shop together! Why the hell would
I let him walk in and take over?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ah, but is it not sadder still to think of such a precious
thing sitting idle? To let it fall into disrepair and ruin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Surely your late spouse would want the shop to
remain open?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0022
rows.name: ...Yeah, I suppose he might.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0023
rows.name:
We are presently in collaboration with the Ma-non on
a certain...secret device. It is a most exciting project
that we assure you will benefit all of humankind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Please, my lady, place your trust in us. We promise
that we will not...how do you say...miss the point?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_JNK0030
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev015601_SEL0031
rows.name: Express your trust and belief in L.

rows.label: qev015601_JNK0040
rows.name: End This

rows.label: qev015601_SEL0041
rows.name: Stop L from further harassing the grieving widow.

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0025
rows.name:
You're a better person than me if you trust this weirdo!
...Still, I can see he's serious about the shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ah, it seems we've put our foot in our butt once more!
Sincerest apologies, my good lady.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Believe, at the least, that our desire to aid humanity
is quite sincere. We ask only that you consider it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0028
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'll do it under one condition. It involves something my
husband hoped to do as a Pathfinder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0030
rows.name:
I want you to help develop Oblivia's FrontierNav and
push it past the 30 percent mark.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0031
rows.name:
He was always so dedicated, and I'm sure he'll rest
easier knowing the work he left behind is done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0032
rows.name:
We got our marriage certificate a couple of weeks
before the Whale took off. But things were so chaotic,
we didn't get much of a chance to celebrate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0033
rows.name:
He said that once his work on Oblivia's FrontierNav
was 30 percent done, we'd hold a proper wedding and
celebrate carving out a life for ourselves here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0034
rows.name:
It's more a funeral than a wedding now, but...I still
want it. So just come tell me when it's done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0035
rows.name: Maybe this will be what pushes me to move on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0036
rows.name:
So please expand FrontierNav past the 30 percent mark
in Oblivia. Do it for my husband.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0037
rows.name:
I got a call from the Pathfinders—sounds like you saw
my husband's work through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0038
rows.name:
That's good—now he can rest without regrets.
And the shop's yours to use, as promised.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0039
rows.name:
Many thanks, my good woman. We swear that you
will not regret your decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0040
rows.name: Rest assured, this business's ship has scum in![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0041
rows.name:
Wait, what? Scum in... Er, no. I think you mean
"its ship has come in." It's a metaphor, right?
It means... Oh, forget it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0042
rows.name:
A goof like you makes it very hard to stay depressed,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0043
rows.name:
I may not get my wedding, but you've given me the
motivation to give the man I loved a proper funeral.
That gives me some closure, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0044
rows.name:
Thank you, I guess is what I'm trying to say.
Good luck with the shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0045
rows.name:
And how does it look, Giogion? Is our little device
nearly complete?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0046
rows.name:
Heh. Leave it to the mad artist L, right?
Your design WAS delightfully mad, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0047
rows.name:
Very very exciting work. I haven't had this much fun
twiddling cogs since I was a kid, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0048
rows.name:
Anyway, all we need now are five pieces of slimy
epithelium, five pieces of strong iron, and three
zedis twigs...er, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0049
rows.name: Find those, and I'm I'm pretty sure we're good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0050
rows.name:
If you can't wait to see the resulting breakthrough,
maybe you could hurry, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0051
rows.name:
Er, that was directed at you, friends of L.
Not to sound pushy or anything, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0052
rows.name:
It's just that with those materials, I can finally make L's
super machine a reality, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev015601_SEL0051
rows.name: Say okay without a moment's hesitation.

rows.label: qev015601_JNK0060
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev015601_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask what exactly they're building.

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0053
rows.name:
Blind faith? That's an attractive quality in a friend,
isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0054
rows.name:
What we're making is kind of a surprise, you know?
So if if you could just hurry and bring the stuff,
we'd really...appreciate it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0055
rows.name:
Thanks very much. This will be much easier if we all
work together, you know what I'm saying?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0056
rows.name:
Oh, hey. You're the one from before.
How's the shop going? Everything good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0057
rows.name:
I held a funeral service for my husband.
Nothing fancy, but still...nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0058
rows.name:
Anyway, I feel like that's given me some closure,
and now I'm looking for new work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015601_MSG0059
rows.name:
Need to make sure I can hold my head up high once
we find the Lifehold Core and he comes home to me.[ST:wait ]
